mapper.update: update userinfo set delFlg='1' where username = #{username}
mapper.select: select * from userinfo where delFlg = '0' and userinfo.username =#{username}
select userinfo.username,password,sex,major,intro,hobby from userinfo left join hobby on userinfo.username = hobby.username where userinfo.delFlg = '0' and userinfo.username =#{username}
